document_data.mainbody:
lanna was a cleric from the Temple of Waukeen in Neverwinter in the late 14 century during the years that followed the Shadow War.
Alanna was an attractive woman with red-chestnut hair. She wore her churchs robes and a golden circlet.
Alanna was a cheerful and pleasant cleric who warmly greeted visitors to the Temple of Waukeen.
Alanna arrived in Neverwinter with her church shortly after the Shadow War of the  by Lord Nasher Alagondars invitation. Once the temple opened its doors in the Tyrs Eye, where the citys mages academy once stood, Alanna worked at the front of the chapel, warmly welcoming guests and answering any questions they mightve had.
